cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
Has been in two wrecks, but with the body work done you would never know!
Want a car that'll get you to Point A to Point B, and maybe not much further? Here you go.
This truck just randomly showed up yesterday, we think a ghost used to own it.
